note: My pronouns: she/her. I'm curious about anything and everything. I'm into playing folk music, spirituality, science fiction, bats, and much more. I was born in 1964; married to my wonderful husband since 2007. I live in the Las Vegas, Nevada area in the US.

Hi everyone. My pronouns are she/her. I'm a very curious person. I'm interested in bats, science-fiction, folklore, and folk music, among other things. I'm bisexual and monogamous, and my husband and I have been married since 2007. We live in the Las Vegas, Nevada, US area. I'm totally blind since birth and I have moderate sensorineural hearing loss; I use hearing-aids. I was born in 1964. *Heads-up: I no longer follow anyone who has nothing in a profile bio.
